summary: Completed testing of banner visibility fix, chat backend APIs, and file upload functionality. Banner visibility working correctly. All backend chat APIs functional. Frontend authentication issue preventing full UI testing.

integration_issues.issue: Login form returns 'Invalid email or password' error for admin credentials

passed_tests: Banner visibility - Feedback banner visible below navbar on home page
Banner visibility - Banners correctly hidden on /chat page
Backend API: GET /api/chat/groups - returns list of groups
Backend API: POST /api/chat/groups - creates new group successfully
Backend API: POST /api/chat/groups with initial_members - creates group with members
Backend API: POST /api/chat/groups/{id}/messages - sends text messages
Backend API: POST /api/chat/groups/{id}/messages/upload - file upload with multipart form data
Backend API: GET /api/chat/attachments/{id} - retrieves attachment data
Backend API: POST /api/chat/groups/{id}/add-member - adds members to groups
Backend API: POST /api/chat/groups/{id}/remove-member - removes members from groups
Backend API: GET /api/chat/users/search?q=query - searches users by name/email
Chat page loads without banners (correctly hidden)
Home page shows feedback banner below navbar (correctly positioned)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix frontend authentication - login form failing with 'Invalid email or password' for admin credentials (troa.systems@gmail.com). This prevents testing of chat UI functionality including file upload interface, member management modals, and group creation with initial members.

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All chat API endpoints working correctly
